Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a tiebreaking solo homer in the ninth inning to lead the Brewers to a 5-4 win over the Reds
Post-Match Reflections: The Brewers secured their fifth consecutive win with the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Great American Ball Park in Cincinnati with an attendance of 27,881
Others: Betting odds and win probability were also mentioned
